articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The chair of the State Duma Committee on Energy said Russia would accept Bitcoin for its energy exports—at least from China and Turkey.
articles.title: Russia Energy Committee Chair: We'll Take Bitcoin for Oil and Gas

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The alleged creators of the Frosties NFT project, a well-known “rug pull,” were charged with wire fraud and money laundering.
articles.title: US Justice Dept. Charges Ethereum NFT Project Creators Over 'Rug Pull'

articles.author: Rene Millman,Liam J. Kelly,Stephen Graves
articles.description: The long-planned upgrade to Ethereum aims to improve the network’s scalability and security by switching to a proof of stake consensus mechanism.
articles.title: What Is Ethereum 2.0? Ethereum's Consensus Layer and Merge Explained

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: U.S. senators will now vote on the bill—and President Bukele isn’t happy.
articles.title: Bukele Slams US Bill That Targets 'Potential Risks' of El Salvador’s Bitcoin Law

articles.author: Ekin Genç
articles.description: There's a lot of money flowing into DeFi. And thanks to hacks and exploits, there's sometimes a lot of money flowing out, too.
articles.title: 11 Biggest DeFi Hacks and Heists

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: Diplo is the latest major artist to embrace a token-based approach to music releases, using the platform Royal.
articles.title: Grammy Winning DJ Diplo to Sell $99 Tokens in New Single

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: El Salvador’s president, Nayib Bukele, claims he buys Bitcoin using public money on his phone. How secure is that?
articles.title: How Secure Is El Salvador’s Bitcoin?

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Leading meme coin DOGE has risen by double digits amid news that Bitcoin of America has added Dogecoin to its crypto ATMs.
articles.title: Dogecoin Rises 14% as Bitcoin ATM Operator Adds DOGE to Kiosks

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: ADA is up 13% over the day following news that Coinbase is now offering staking for Cardano’s native cryptocurrency.
articles.title: Cardano Skyrockets as Coinbase Rolls Out Staking for ADA

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: A Ukrainian refugee has reached Poland with approximately 40% of his life savings held in Bitcoin.
articles.title: Ukrainian Refugee With $2,000 in Bitcoin Reaches Poland

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Coinbase says the exchange has additional "plans to continue to scale our staking portfolio" throughout 2022.
articles.title: Coinbase Adds Cardano Staking Rewards

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The PUBG battle royale series has more than a billion downloads across platforms, and now its publisher is building on Solana.
articles.title: Studio Behind Smash Hit PUBG Series Will Make Solana NFT Games

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Zuckerberg’s metaverse is going crypto, and Meta’s logo will be at the nexus of it all.
articles.title: Meta Files Trademarks for Crypto Tokens, Wallets, Exchanges

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The measure would apply specifically to businesses, not individuals.
articles.title: Florida Gov. DeSantis: 'We Will Accept Bitcoin' for State Taxes

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Jerome Powell reiterated today that new laws may need to be drafted for the digital finance world.
articles.title: Fed's Powell Again Raises Alarms Over 'Financial Stability' of Crypto Products

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Bitcoin is re-establishing its connection with the equities index, but some investors maintain it's a risk-off asset.
articles.title: Bitcoin's Correlation With S&P 500 Reaches 17-Month High

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Celebrities are flocking to the metaverse-centric startup, which also has Paris Hilton, Nas, and Gene Simmons on its cap table.
articles.title: Will Smith, The Weeknd Back NFT Metaverse Land Investor Everyrealm

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The truckers from the Freedom Convoy raised nearly 21 Bitcoin, but the Canadian government has reportedly seized less than 6.
articles.title: Canadian Authorities Struggle to Seize Freedom Convoy’s Bitcoin Donations

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The LRC token jumps 34% after GameStop adds Loopring as another scaling partner alongside Immutable X.
articles.title: GameStop Ethereum NFT Marketplace Beta Launches With Loopring Integration

articles.author: Zach Hungate
articles.description: Big fashion houses are the ones who typically dictate what's in style—that won't be the case in the metaverse, says the head of gaming at Everyrealm.
articles.title: Why Big Brands Won't Rule Fashion in the Metaverse

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Cashio, a Solana-based stablecoin project, has been looted for millions after attackers leveraged an “infinite mint glitch.”
articles.title: Solana Stablecoin Project Cashio Plummets to Zero After Multi-Million Dollar Hack

articles.author: Robert Stevens
articles.description: Optimism helps Ethereum users save on gas fees by rolling up batches of transactions, using a technology known as optimistic rollups.
articles.title: What is Optimism? Using Rollups to Help Scale Ethereum

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: First a fund, then a DAO, dao5 will be focused on investing in early-stage protocols and blockchain companies.
articles.title: Former Polychain Capital Partner Launches $125M Crypto Fund That Will Become DAO

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Crypto.com has been unveiled as a sponsor for this year’s FIFA World Cup.
articles.title: Crypto.com Revealed as Sponsor for FIFA World Cup 2022

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The ban does not apply to crypto used for investment purposes, according to Thailand's Securities and Exchange Commission.
articles.title: Thailand Bans Use of Cryptocurrencies for Payments

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The funds could be a sight for sore eyes for the project, which recently paused some operations.
articles.title: Eye-Scanning Crypto Project Worldcoin Set for $100 Million Raise: Report

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The government pointed to market volatility and said things should look better for the Bitcoin bond by September.
articles.title: El Salvador Postpones Bitcoin Bond Due to Unfavorable Crypto Market

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Today, the Ellen show. Tomorrow... the moon?
articles.title: NFT Band Debuts With Singer Kiesza on Ellen Degeneres Show

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Before its recent Solana NFT push, G2 signed with Bondly in 2021 for Polygon NFTs that never materialized.
articles.title: G2 Esports Files Lawsuit Against Bondly Over Scrapped NFTs on Polygon

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: A major piece of crypto legislation from Sen. Cynthia Lummis is poised to attract Democratic co-sponsors.
articles.title: Wyoming Senator's Crypto Bill to Receive Democratic Support: Source

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Yesterday’s Goldman Sachs announcement has partly helped with Bitcoin’s sudden price spike, market analysts say.
articles.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Are Soaring Again. Experts Explain Why

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Haun left a16z in 2021 to start Haun Ventures.
articles.title: Andreessen Horowitz Vet Katie Haun Raises $1.5 Billion for Web3 Fund

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Now valued in the billions, Yuga Labs also confirmed plans to launch Otherside, a Web3 MMORPG metaverse with NFTs.
articles.title: Bored Ape and CryptoPunk NFTs Owner Yuga Labs Raises $450M at $4B Valuation

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Storybook Brawl’s developers come from previous roles on Magic: The Gathering, Elder Scrolls: Legends, and Hearthstone.
articles.title: FTX Acquires Good Luck Games, Maker of Storybook Brawl

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The league cited the growing popularity of cryptocurrency and NFTs as part of its reasoning.
articles.title: NFL Reverses Course on Blockchain Sponsorships, Keeps Ban on Crypto and Token Deals

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Buterin clarifies his comments about “gambling” on “$3M monkeys,” but says he’d rather see NFTs fund public goods.
articles.title: Ethereum Creator Vitalik Buterin: I Don’t Hate Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Coinbase Ventures, Solana Ventures, and Animoca back a new studio of game industry veterans building NFT games on Solana.
articles.title: Block Tackle Raises $5M to Develop Solana NFT Skateboarding Game

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: In the wake of SEC ETF rejections, Grayscale is launching an altcoin fund focused on seven major blockchains.
articles.title: Grayscale Investments Creates Smart Contract Fund for Solana, Avalanche, Polygon, Cardano

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: Robinhood is replacing its debit card with a new "Cash Card" that will offer some credit card-style rewards, including crypto bonuses.
articles.title: Robinhood's New Debit Card to Offer Crypto Rewards

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The British advertising authority has issued a May 2 deadline for as many as 50 crypto firms to get their marketing in order.
articles.title: UK Regulator Sets 'Red Alert' Deadline for Crypto Ads

articles.description: Andrew Yang, the former presidential and NYC mayoral candidate, talked crypto regulation in DC on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says the days of little or no crypto regulation in DC are "very very quickly coming to end" and that the question now is what the new rules will look like.
articles.title: Andrew Yang on Crypto Regulation in DC: 'This Train Is Coming. What's the Cargo?'

articles.description: Gitcoin co-founder Scott Moore tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson all about Gitcoin's GR13 grant, which is raising money for Ukraine and has matching participation from a range of Web3 names like OpenSea, OlympusDAO, NounsDAO, Polygon, Algorand, and more.
articles.title: Gitcoin's Scott Moore Talks Ukraine Fundraising Grant

articles.description: Robert Drost, Head of R&D at ConsenSys, talks Layer 2s and building atop Ethereum with James Prestwich of Nomad and Sreeram Kannan of LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.
articles.title: The Importance of Layer 2: ConsenSys, Nomad, and LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: Jordan Garbis, co-founder of BeetsDAO, and Kent Barton, who does tokenomics at ShapeShift DAO, talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming about how to start a DAO, the hurdles with growing them, how to handle tokenomics and reward structure, and how to approach bad behavior by DAO members. At the end, they also took questions from the audience.
articles.title: ShapeShift, BeetsDAO Talk DAO Creation and Governance at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: The former presidential candidate and NYC mayoral candidate has launched Lobby3, a DC lobbying DAO. He talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about his crypto journey, the potential of DAOs, and the need to blend a Web3 approach with "the old-fashioned way" to spur change in DC.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 5: Andrew Yang Wants You to Join His DAO

articles.description: Edward Snowden gives an extensive interview to Marta Belcher of Filecoin Foundation for Camp Ethereal 2022, taped on February 27. He talks about how governments view crypto as "an evolving threat," how crypto "transforms power relationships," why he thinks Ethereum "suffers from the same privacy problems as Bitcoin," and why he views central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) as "crypto-fascist currencies."
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Governments and Crypto, CBDCs, and Ethereum vs Bitcoin at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis and Big Night Entertainment managing partner Tim Bonito tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their deal for a Boston nightclub residency and record collaboration with DJ duo ESCAPΞPLAN, and give their takes on Ethereum vs Solana for buying and trading NFTs.
articles.title: Musician Dillon Francis on Ethereum vs Solana for NFTs

articles.description: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin what drew him to NFTs, and heaps a lot of praise on DJ 3LAU for pioneering in the space and prompting more artists to get in.
articles.title: Musician Dillon Francis: Why I'm Getting Into NFTs

articles.description: ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin talked about Ethereum 2.0 timing and impact, the power of DAOs, and gave his honest take on NFTs, Solana, Polygon, and Biden's crypto executive order in an extensive fireside chat with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.
articles.title: Joe Lubin Talks Ethereum 2.0, NFTs, and DAOs at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried sits down for a conversation with one of his heroes, the moral philosopher and Princeton University professor Peter Singer, exclusively for Camp Ethereal 2022, powered by Decrypt. They talk animal rights, climate change, effective giving, Bitcoin's energy use, and how crypto is helping Ukraine.
articles.title: Crypto and Effective Altruism: Sam Bankman-Fried Interviews Peter Singer at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Decrypt Daily podcast host Matthew Diemer chat live in Wyoming about the crypto executive order and other insights from Camp Ethereal 2022.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Biden's Executive Order & Ethereal 2022

articles.description: As Russia’s invasion of Ukraine continues, Ukraine has raised more than $50 million in crypto donations—in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Polkadot, and even Dogecoin. Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Scott Chipolina, and Kate Irwin, joined by special guest Izabella Kaminska of The Blind Spot, discuss the biggest story in the world right now.
articles.title: Decrypting the Week 10: Ukraine Welcomes Crypto

articles.description: On Episode 4 of Decrypt's gm podcast, Muneeb Ali of Stacks gave Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts his take on why NFTs are so triggering to people. He understands why they're easy to make fun of or "dismiss as a toy," but expects them to be used for a whole range of important business purposes in the future.
articles.title: Muneeb Ali: It's 'Easy to Make Fun' of NFTs, But They Are Here to Stay

articles.description: Blanksoles, a decentralized sneaker company, announced a partnership with former NBA champion Metta Sandiford-Artest—better known as Metta World Peace, and before that Ron Artest—to launch "Metta Designsoles," a series of limited edition Solana-based NFTs and physical sneakers. They discuss with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.
articles.title: NBA Alum Metta World Peace and Raymond Dong of Blanksoles Talk NFTs

articles.description: Muneeb Ali is a Bitcoin OG whose project Stacks, formerly Blockstack, pulled off the first SEC-approved token sale for its STX token. But even though Muneeb has become the leading advocate for building dapps on top of the Bitcoin blockchain, don't call him a Bitcoin maximalist. He tells Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts on the gm how he fends off maximalists on Twitter, what he'd do if he were Twitter CEO, and how the Stacks ecosystem is growing.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 4: Fighting Bitcoin Maximalism with Muneeb Ali

articles.description: On Episode 3 of Decrypt's gm podcast, Amy Wu, the head of FTX Ventures, gave Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts her take on the Jack Dorsey vs Andreessen Horowitz feud over Web3. "There’s this constant narrative and paranoia that Web3 will become centralized, just like the previous rise of industries and the Internet... I think it’s good for people to remain paranoid about it," she said. She also commented on a16z's huge size in the space.
articles.title: FTX's Amy Wu Sounds Off on Dorsey vs Andreessen
